# TechNick.AI

> Personal and professional site of Nick Sullivan - engineering leader, 3Ã— founding engineer, and AI infrastructure builder in Austin, TX. 50,000 hours of craft, two successful exits, now building tools that make AI development actually work.

## Site Pages

- [Home](index.html): Complete profile including story, philosophy, projects, values, and ways to connect
- [Career](career/index.html): Engineering leadership experience, team-building track record, and career opportunities
- [Code Forge](code-forge/index.html): Open source projects showcase with production-ready AI infrastructure tools

## Open Source Projects

- [Carmenta](https://carmenta.ai): Unified AI platform with memory persistence and voice
- [MCP Hubby](https://mcphubby.ai): Production MCP gateway with 95% context reduction through progressive disclosure
- [claude_telemetry](https://github.com/TechNickAI/claude_telemetry): Observability wrapper for Claude Code with OTEL integration
- [ai-coding-config](https://github.com/TechNickAI/ai-coding-config): Claude Code plugin marketplace and Cursor configuration library
- [heart-centered-prompts](https://github.com/technickai/heart-centered-prompts): AI system prompts using heart-centered principles
